Keep on fighting.

There is something inside, that they can't get to, that they can't touch. That's yours.

I am Hong Yan, a phD student of Computer Science and Technology in Shanghai Jiao Tong University SJTU . I completed Master's degree in Shanghai Jiao Tong University on March 30, 2019 and earned Bachelor's degree in Information Engineer at Shenzhen University on July 1，2016.

My research interests cover Computer Vision, Deep Learning, Meta Learning and Image Generation.

I support open source (@hy-zpg). In my free time, I dive into watching movies, losing in running.
